posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA 4 (any back) Lajoie, Speaker, Young (bare hand), Walsh.

Also looking for PSA 4 non-standard backs (Sweet Cap, Piedmont) in PSA 4 in any HOFer, Cicotte, Burns, and Chase. 

The only thing that I really look for is that the image and back advertisement not be sloped in any way. 

Trade bait (all PSA 4):

Brown Chicago Shirt SC
Chance Yellow Portrait PM
Ed Collins Portrait SOV
Matty Portrait PM
McGraw Glove at Hip SC (with wet sheet transfer)
